src:
覚せい剤、別物にすり替え「泳がせ捜査」…受け取った組幹部ら逮捕

07 Nov 2019, 06:00

　泳がせ捜査で覚醒剤から別物にすり替えられた荷物を所持したとして、福岡県警が指定暴力団太州会（本部・福岡県田川市）系組幹部ら４人を麻薬特例法違反（規制薬物としての所持）容疑で現行犯逮捕していたことがわかった。
　捜査関係者によると、組幹部と組員ら４人は１０月中旬頃、同県香春町の自動車関連会社に配送された荷物を薬物と認識して受け取った疑いが持たれている。４人は「中身は知らない」などと容疑を否認しているという。
　同月、イランから関西国際空港に到着した貨物便に覚醒剤約６キロが隠されているのを税関が発見。捜査当局が中身を別物にすり替え、泳がせ捜査を実施し、受取人の４人を特定した。
　県警は販売目的で密輸したとみて、組幹部ら数人を覚醒剤取締法違反（営利目的輸入）容疑で再逮捕する方針。
text:
Stimulant, switch to another "swimming investigation" ... arrested executives received

07 Nov 2019, 06:00

As a result of the investigation, the Fukuoka Prefectural Police accused four senior executives of the designated gangster Tajukai (Headquarters, Tagawa City, Fukuoka Prefecture), who violated the Narcotics Special Law (possible possession as a regulated drug). It turns out that the current criminal was arrested on suspicion.
According to investigators, the group executives and the four members are alleged to have received the parcels delivered to car-related companies in Koharu-cho, the same prefecture, as a drug in mid-October. The four allegedly denied the charges such as “I don't know the contents”.
In the same month, Customs discovered that about 6 kg of stimulant was hidden on cargo flights arriving at Kansai International Airport from Iran. The investigative authorities replaced the contents with another one, conducted a swimming investigation, and identified four recipients.
The prefectural police believe that they smuggled for sales purposes and will re-arrest several executives and others on suspicion of violating the stimulant control law (for-profit import).
